Wisteria Lodge in Roodepoort received a 2018 Best Value Destination Award.

About Wisteria Lodge

Wisteria Lodge is situated in the suburb of Weltevreden Park in North-West Johannesburg. This pleasant cottage features exposed wooden beams, screeded floors and African touched, showcased during the day by plenty natural light. It is ideal for anyone seeking comfortable accommodation and guaranteed privacy. The external terrace situated just off the living area is great for evening sundowners overlooking the city lights of Johannesburg.

Wisteria Lodge sits adjacent to a scenic indigenous park, suitable for walks, and is walking distance from the local supermarket. Many shops, restaurants, facilities and tourist attractions lie within a 10-30 minute drive, including the Cradle of Human Kind, Sandton City, Randpark Golf Club and many more. Downtown Johannesburg is also reached within a 30 minute drive.

Wisteria Lodge offers one bedroom furnished with a double bed, an en-suite bathroom with bath and shower. The lounge area is open-plan, situated beside the kitchen and features a TV with a full DSTV package. Regular servicing and laundry can be done on request.

Main Features

  • Breakfast and dinner on request (additional cost applies)
  • One bedroom
  • En-suite bathroom with bath and shower
  • Open-plan lounge, dining and kitchen area
  • TV with full DSTV
  • Outdoor terrace
  • Braai
  • Laundry
  • Secure parking
  • Kitchen includes:
    • Refrigerator
    • Microwave
    • Oven
    • Stove
    • Kettle
    • Cutlery and crockery
